dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5210 IH: To prohibit providing Federal funds for the National Endowment for the Humanities.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To prohibit providing Federal funds for the National Endowment for the Humanities.

section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds may be made available to the National Endowment for the Humanities.
